item.title: Multiscale Optimization of Formic Acid Dehydrogenation Process Via Linear Model Decision Tree Surrogates
item.description:
Ethan M. Sunshine, Giovanna Bucci, Tanusree Chatterjee, Shyam Deo, Victoria M. Ehlinger, Wenqin Li, Thomas Moore, Corey Myers, Wenyu Sun, Bo-Xun Wang, Mengyao Yuan, John R. Kitchin, Carl D. Laird, Matthew J. McNenly, Sneha A. Akhade, No host. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4400149477
No abstract
